definitions.description: Generic activity representing work needed to be done.

constantValues: Generic activity representing work needed to be done.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Task' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
supportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: msret_ExecutionActivity
members.description: Related Task setup from which was Task created. If empty, Task category is Ad Hoc Task.

constantValues: Related Task setup from which was Task created. If empty, Task category is Ad Hoc Task.

members.name: msret_IsReviewRequired
members.description: Indicates if task completion requires review or not

constantValues: Indicates if task completion requires review or not

members.name: msret_OutletZone
members.description: Zone / location inside the retail store

constantValues: Zone / location inside the retail store

members.name: msret_PictureMandatory
members.description: Image must be attached to the task when true

constantValues: Image must be attached to the task when true

members.name: msret_PreviousUser
members.description: User who switched the state to "For review"

constantValues: User who switched the state to "For review"

members.name: msret_Reviewer
members.description: Select who reviews the task upon submission

constantValues: Select who reviews the task upon submission

members.name: msret_TaskListName
members.description: Name of plan from which was task Created

constantValues: Name of plan from which was task Created

members.name: msret_IsPastDue
members.description: Indicates if the task is past the due date or not

constantValues: Indicates if the task is past the due date or not

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}
